publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3460 Mr Murray Tosh on behalf of the Procedures Committee: Standards Commissioner - Procedures Committee’s 4th Report 2002—That the Parliament agrees the recommendations for changes to the Standing Orders of the Scottish Parliament concerning the Scottish Parliamentary Standards Commissioner contained in the Procedures Committee’s 4th Report 2002, Changes to the Standing Orders concerning the Scottish Parliamentary Standards Commissioner, European Committee remit, Private Legislation, Temporary Conveners and the Journal of the Scottish Parliament (SP Paper 665), and agrees that these changes shall come into effect on 14 October 2002. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Macintosh*

S1M-3460 Mr Murray Tosh on behalf of the Procedures Committee: Standards Commissioner - Procedures Committee's 4th Report 2002—That the Parliament agrees the recommendations for changes to the Standing Orders of the Scottish Parliament concerning the Scottish Parliamentary Standards Commissioner contained in the Procedures Committee’s 4th Report 2002, Changes to Standing Orders concerning the Scottish Parliamentary Standards Commissioner, European Committee remit, Private Legislation, Temporary Conveners and the Journal of the Scottish Parliament (SP Paper 665), and that agrees that these changes shall come into effect on 14 October 2002. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Macintosh
